summary: Project with video functionality; user wants to add thumbnail support for videos.

existing_features.title: On the Upload Video page, add an optional thumbnail image upload input that accepts common image formats (JPEG, PNG, WebP). The selected image should be previewed before submission and uploaded alongside the video.
Display the video thumbnail image in the VideoCard component. If no thumbnail has been set, show a neutral placeholder graphic instead.
On the Video Player page, display the thumbnail as the poster/preview image shown before the video begins playing.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow users to add/manage thumbnails for videos
Extend the backend video record to include an optional thumbnail blob field, and add an endpoint to upload/update a video's thumbnail (accepting image blob data) and retrieve it.
